name: Fat To Buff - Lose Weight!
description:
All those doughnuts, hamburgers, and fries have finally taken their toll. But it's time to be fat no more. It's time to lose weight and get fit. Help your clients reach their ideal weight by playing 6 challenging minigames. Squat, lift, jump as you test your finger skills in an attempt to lose the extra weight. But it won't be easy as you'll
have to master each mini game to go from fat to buff.

Features:

  • 3 Fat characters ready to play and unlock
    • 6 challenging yet highly addictive mini games: Boxing, Balancing, Weight Lifting, Stepper, Barbell Squat and Rope Skipping
    • Power boosts to up your game: Energy Soda, Headband, Pro Gear, Power Bar and V.I.P Pass
    • Many achievements to unlock
    • Compete with friends and the world for the highest score
    • Watch as your character transforms his body through slimming exercises

    • Can you get everyone fit? Take the challenge and find out! What have you got to lose...except maybe a couple of pounds. Get Fit! Get Buff, Now!
